data.text:
@djfgiugno Hi, I am sorry to hear you have issues with getting in touch with us. We don't have support by email. You can contact us Phone, Live Chat and Facebook messenger, on Chat and Facebook messenger we can assist with informative queries. https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj 
Kind regards, Rebecka

@helgerg Hej, vad tråkigt att höra att du blivit ombokad. Om du önskar omboka resan till andra alternativ så kan du ringa oss på tel +47 21 896 400. Eventuella covid-19 dokument kan du visa upp på flygplatsen före din avresa om inte destinationen stödjs i Travel Ready Center.

// Anton.

Vänliga hälsningar, Rebecka

@Grimblessss Hi, I am sorry that your flight was changed. Please call our support so we can assist you with finding an alternative that suit you. You can find our phone numbers here: https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj
Kind regards, Rebecka

urls.title: Contact Us – Find Your Local Telephone Number

data.text:
@GPSJohn Hi, the website is live. I recommend you to clear cache and cookies or a different web browser. Also try to temporarily turning off your VPN service if you use it. If the issues still remain, please contact our support by phone: https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj
Kind regards, Rebecka

urls.title: Contact Us – Find Your Local Telephone Number
urls.description: If you need to get in touch with us, you will find here local telephone numbers to Customer Service, SAS Corporate Sales Center and SAS Group Sales »

data.text:
@TheSoccerDucks Hi, the campaign is covering Cityjet as well if you book the flights directly on our website. The campaign does not cover Star Alliance or Widerøe flights. If you feel unsure about your booking, please contact our Customer service: https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj
Kind regards, Rebecka

@TheNecronon Hi, SAS only require you to wear a facemask during your flight. The countries of your destination and transits may require tests. You may bring one carry-on of maximum 55 cm x 40 cm x 23 cm and 8kg, no additional items or bags are allowed in the cabin.
Kind regards, Rebecka

data.text:
@KRZYSZTOF_UK Hi, I am sorry to hear you are still missing your refund. Please contact us on Live Chat, Facebook Messenger or by Phone so we can assist you with your refund. You can find our Live chat and phone numbers here: https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj
Kind regards, Rebecka

urls.title: Delayed, Lost and Damaged Baggage
urls.description: We transport your baggage with care. But if your baggage has been delayed, lost or damaged for some reason, here you can find helpful information »

data.text: @ultrafondista Hi! you can read here on what to do: https://t.co/KQdOdrH9TM . Kind regards, Jonna.
@_baelog Hi! you can write to us via our live-chat on SAS webpage or write to us on messenger, We can take a look at your booking there and help you. Kind regards, Jonna.
@langeliniealle Hi! you can write to us via our live-chat on SAS webpage or write to us on messenger, We can take a look at your voucher there and help you. Kind regards, Jonna.

@AirlineFlyer Hi Jason,

From what we can see it appears that the tickets on that flight has been fully sold out unfortunately.

Kind regards,
Philip

@Weegie_KM Hi Kine,

I am sorry to hear that your flight got cancelled. When you check-in your bag you will receive a baggage tag. This tag contains the final destination your bag has been checked-in to.

Kind regards,
Philip

data.text:
@MaxHasler2 Hi, you can find all our phone numbers here: https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj - Please select your region in the drop down menu and click on Customer Service / Eurobonus
Kind regards, Rebecka

urls.title: Manage My Bookings and Flights
urls.description: Log in with your booking reference (5-6 characters) and your last name to see all the details about your flights and manage your bookings »

data.text:
@MaxHasler2 Hi, I am sorry that you haven't been able to get in touch with us. Our phones are manned and we answer as soon as possible. Have you possibly tried using our website to find an alternative while waiting to reach us on phone? https://t.co/yZoPBVnDMr
Kind regards, Rebecka

@AkselChristense Hej, vår support telefon är inte nere, den är öppen mellan 07:00 - 19:00 på vardagar, 09:00-17:00 på lördagar och 09:00 - 18:00 på Söndagar. Vi har däremot många som ringer så det kan ta tid innan du kommer fram.
Vänliga hälsningar, Rebecka

//Anton

data.text:
@GelertNature Hi! Portable electronic items such as powerbanks, cameras and batteries can be transported in your carry-on as long as they do not exceed 100Wh, spare batteries must be packed individually to prevent short-circuit. A maximum of 20 spare batteries per person is allowed.

// Anton.

data.text:
@SjefKirurgen Hej! Vi följer de rekommendationer som tillhandahålls av landets myndigheter samt informationen som finns hos IATA och EASA, om du upplever att detta inte följts korrekt av oss så rekommenderar jag att du sänder din feedback till oss via https://t.co/wprQ9Zejqh

//Anton

@TheSoccerDucks Hi, award tickets does not yield any points or qualifying flights but regular tickets paid with points still do. For example Go Smart Bonus does not give any flights/points as this is an award ticket, but regular Go Smart paid with points does give flights/points.

// Anton.

data.text:
@alexsaunders Hi, Please contact us through chat or phone with the booking reference so we can check the status of the refund.    https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj

You choose Country /region and then press Customer service/Eurobonus to display the numbers

Regards,
Peter

data.text:
@german_beckmann Hi, In this case you contact our support by phone or email. They will update the phone number in the profile manually. 

https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj

Regards,
Peter

@alanmurp Hi, we currently only allow 1 bag or item into the cabin up to 8kg maximum size of 55 cm x 40 cm x 23 cm as carryon. If you wish to bring more luggage, you will need to check in the additional luggage. You can find the prices here: https://t.co/D2hgbaFHcb
Kind regards, Rebecka

@albert_wolszon Hi! If you wish to have everyone on the same ticket, you can book everyone as SAS Go Light and add the extra bag for the person who wish to use it. Alternatively you buy as 2 separate bookings, 2 people with Go light and 1 person with Go Smart.
Kind regards, Rebecka

@aidanrun @aidanrun the currency on the voucher needs to match the currency on our website. To change the currency on our website, scroll down to where you can change the Location. Choose a country that use that currency and it should work better.
Best regards, Mikael.

data.text:
@philipoconnor @philipoconnor vi som flygbolag har inga egna regler gällande dessa tester utan följer de regler som landet i sig har. Enligt den information vi har just nu så behövs inget test när man reser inrikes i Sverige https://t.co/YhT9mVc7De
Med vänlig hälsning, Mikael.

@charllttv Hi, 
There is no reason to be worried that the check in is handled at the airport. It is not uncommon that the online check-in is closed by the airport due to covid. 

Regards, 
Peter

urls.description: If you need to get in touch with us, you will find here local telephone numbers to Customer Service, SAS Corporate Sales Center and SAS Group Sales »

data.text:
@AshlySean Hi, 
You can contact us through our messenger or chat support with the booking reference/voucher number and we will look into it.  The chat is accessed through https://t.co/b3QIqPBI2R by pressing the blue face icon in the bottom right corner.

Regards,
Peter

@split211 Hi, As listed on the linked page:

For booking class K, L, T or O.   
Online – up until 22 h before departure    60 USD
At the airport – start 22 h before departure 119 USD

All booking classes except for K, L, T and O
Online  89 USD
At the airport  119 USD

Regards,
Peter

@NalabalaSarah Hi, 

Then there is unfortunately no way to get status of the case.

Regards,
Peter

data.text:
@globaltravelexp Hi, 

If the trip is booked on our tickets you can request a refund through https://t.co/Y7XCcQnuYI

Regards,
Peter

The Swedish and Norwegian governments have decided to change their travel advice. From 1 October, @SweMFA and @NorwayMFA will no longer advise against unnecessary travel. 💙

More info: https://t.co/KOLniTn3tu https://t.co/79eH24nHeq

data.text:
@larsxsamuelsson Hej! Kravet på ansiktsmask under SAS flyg är planerat att fortsatt gälla. Om något ändras kan du hitta denna information här: https://t.co/RWpVwLQoMq

Tack för att du kontaktar oss, hälsningar Anja!

@theghostofkip Hi Caitlin
Try and delete cookies , history and cache memory. You can also try with another browser, google chrome for example. 
I hope that solves the issue.
Kind regards /Anna

Kind regards, Rebecka
